comment.raw:
/**
 * A polyfill for `element.computeStyleMap()` that falls back to `getComputedStyle()` until firefox catches up.
 *
 * @see
 *
 * {@link https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1857849 | Bugzilla}
 */
comment.summary: A polyfill for element.computeStyleMap() that falls back to getComputedStyle() until firefox catches up.
